title: Circle of the Land
content: ith beasts. Thunderwave Lv 1 Evocation Action 2d8 ThunderRelease a wave of thunderous force. It deals 2d8 Thunder and pushes away creatures and objects. Attack/Save: Constitution Range: 5m/17ft Barkskin Lv 2 Transmutation ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot Touch a willing creature to toughen its skin and increase its Amiour Class up to 16.Until Long RestMeleeConcentration Darkvision Lv 2 Transmutation ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot Grant a creature the ability to see in the dark out to a range of 12m.Until Long
